data.name: 西西莉亚小姐
data.detailed_description:
Game mechanics
In this game, you need to operate a character in the castle to solve the mystery, find a way out. For example, when you enter a secret room and the door is closed, you need to find the props needed to open the door in the room. When you collect the props, the door will be opened and you can leave normally.
The story is introduced
In the castle, you are experiencing what a servant would experience.
Miss Cecilia is a 3D, first-person game, just like a traditional puzzle game. It has an interesting story and a good interactive experience.
Game features: The game will be constantly updated, you can find a lot of interesting eggs in the game, there will be a lot of interesting gameplay, very suitable for some curious players and game developers to play.

data.short_description: Miss Cecilia would always be in a position, always thinking of someone who could take her away, but how could anyone ever show up?
